name: Odd-Eyes Starlight-Blast Supernova Dragon
text:
2+ Monsters including an "Odd-Eyes" monster
If this card is Link Summoned using only "Odd-Eyes" monsters: Destroy all cards your opponent controls. Pendulum monsters this card points to cannot be targeted by your opponent’s cards or effects. Once per turn, you can target 1 "Odd-Eyes" card you control; destroy it and if you do Special Summon 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster with a different name than that card from your hand or Deck. You can only Special Summon "Odd-Eyes Starlight-Blast Supernova Dragon" once per turn.
